termsContent.title: Terms of Service
termsContent.intro: By using Le Middle, you agree to these terms.
termsContent.serviceDesc: Le Middle is a free service to find equidistant meeting places by public transport in Paris and Île-de-France.
termsContent.usageDesc: The service is provided "as is". Travel times and venue information are indicative and may vary.
termsContent.dataDesc: We do not store your personal data. Searches are processed in real-time and are not recorded.
termsContent.liabilityDesc: Le Middle cannot be held responsible for information provided by third-party services (Google Places, public transport).
termsContent.changesDesc: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.

privacyContent.title: Privacy Policy
privacyContent.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we handle your data.
privacyContent.collectedDesc: We do not collect any personally identifiable data. Entered addresses are only used to calculate routes and are not stored.
privacyContent.analyticsDesc: We use privacy-friendly analytics tools (Plausible/Umami) that do not collect personal data and do not require GDPR consent.
privacyContent.cookiesDesc: Our site does not use tracking cookies. Only essential technical cookies may be used for the proper functioning of the service.
privacyContent.thirdPartyDesc: We use Google Maps/Places for venue information. These services have their own privacy policies.
privacyContent.rightsDesc: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data. As we do not store any personal data, these rights are automatically exercised.
privacyContent.contactDesc: For any questions about your data, contact us at the address below.
